c1.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
c1.descriptionRaw: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro RES</color> reduced by 15% for 6s.
c1.description: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

c2.name: Oil Meets Fire
c2.descriptionRaw: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.
c2.description: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

c3.name: Deepfry
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Guoba Mad
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guoba Attack</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Condensed Pyronado
c6.descriptionRaw: For the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color>, all party members receive a 15% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color>.
c6.description: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.
